definition: Taiwan variant of 熒光|荧光[ying2 guang1]
Taiwan variant of 熒光燈|荧光灯[ying2 guang1 deng1]

sentences.english: The silver oxide exhibits photoactived fluorescence.
sentences.chinese: 氧化银本身具有光催化的萤光。

sentences.english: Who do you think was the brightest star of the silver screen?
sentences.chinese: 你认为谁是萤光幕前最闪亮的明星？

sentences.english: I've bought a whole box of highlighters. What color do you want?
sentences.chinese: 我已经买了一整盒的萤光笔你要甚么颜色？

sentences.english: The appearance of flicker can occur if the frame frequency is close to the frequency of fluorescent lights.
sentences.chinese: 闪烁的出现能发生如果框架频率接近于萤光的频率灯。

sentences.english: I've bought a whole box of highlighters. Which color would you like?
sentences.chinese: 我已经买了一整盒的萤光笔，你想要甚么颜色？

sentences.english: The images are projected on a small screen.
sentences.chinese: 影像投在一个小的萤光幕上。

sentences.english: The difference of fluorescent substance of the hemolymph in healthy and diseased larvae could be detected.
sentences.chinese: 健康与感病幼虫血淋巴萤光物质的变化趋势亦不同。

sentences.english: The box has a small hole through which visitors can watch a television screen.
sentences.chinese: 箱上有一小孔，内有一个小型电视萤光幕。

sentences.english: The goal of this study is to explore the method of preparation YAG powder and the fluorescent character.
sentences.chinese: 研究了钇铝石榴石萤光粉的合成及其发光特性。

sentences.english: The light of the firefly does not produce heat.
sentences.chinese: 萤光灯较白炽灯省电且发热少。

sentences.english: The semiconductor CdSe nanoparticles exhibit the quantum confined fluorescence.
sentences.chinese: 硒化镉半导体颗粒具有量子局限效应产生的萤光。

sentences.english: Green florescent protein allows the identification of protein expression.
sentences.chinese: 萤光绿蛋白可以用作检测蛋白表达。

sentences.english: Screen when the dust has to be polished, so as to increase visibility.
sentences.chinese: 萤光幕有尘埃时必须擦拭，以增加可视度。

definition: a glimmer/twinkling (of stars, phosphorescence, candlelight)/flickering light
light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
